p: The Pompia fruits and leaves were produced and collected by “Azienda Scuola Agraria di Siniscola—I.P.S.A.S.R.”, Località San Narciso, Siniscola (NU, Sardinia, Italy). Identification and collection were performed by Piercarlo Ferraris and Peppino Piquereddu of the agronomy school (I.P.S.A.S.R.) in Località Ghiliorro, Siniscola (NU, Sardinia, Italy) in November 2018.
